translations: n.<古>酒吧，客栈（hostelry 的复数）

sentences.sentence: Carrie recognised the name as standing for one of the newest and most imposing hostelries. She had heard it spoken of as having a splendid restaurant.
sentences.translation: 嘉莉想起这是个旅馆的名字，是那些最新、最富丽堂皇的旅馆中的一家。她听人说起它里面设有一个豪华的餐厅。

sentences.sentence: The universe family see, some countries (another "country" in hostelries) keep doing his nuclear blackmail and nuclear threat, and his opinions different countries restless.
sentences.translation: 宇宙大家庭看到，有的国家(又是“国家”在生事)继承搞着他的核讹诈和核威胁，使和他看法不同的国家得不到安宁。
